data.text:
@WelshConserv The British surge” to assist #Ukraine #Refugees at Calais turns out to be 3 officials, some crisps & Kit Kats & not a chance of a visa. Unless you go to Paris. Thank you @BBCMarkEaston reporting the facts - #BorisJohnson & @pritipatel
rhetoric doesn’t meet reality. Disgraceful
@WelshConserv This map tells me Drakeford did the right thing https://t.co/uBTSzYeiAx

@Omlette_Boy @bollerrrr @WelshConserv When compared to similar populations in England we performed about the same. You can’t take pop density in isolation, you have to consider age profile, affluence, pre existing Ill health levels, medical care access (less in rural than cities) and a whole raft of other data.
@WelshConserv Also has a sign language interpreter in his covid presser which the last time I checked wasn't something the prime minister has managed...
@WelshConserv Sod off Tory boy Rydd Cymru 🤥🤥🤥🤥🤡
@WelshConserv That is why he is known as Drippy Drakeford
@MikaLongue @WelshConserv Wonder if he put on ladies perfume on
@danhowells83 @bollerrrr @WelshConserv Anything on population density?  Wales should have done a lot better had they done nothing.
